scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-studio:hemi && npm run deploy-studio:hemi-sepolia
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 $(jq -r .name package.json) --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json)
scripts.deploy-studio:hemi: graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ $(jq -r .name package.json)-hemi  --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json) --network hemi
scripts.deploy-studio:hemi-sepolia: graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ $(jq -r .name package.json)-hemi-sepolia  --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json) --network hemi-sepolia
